name: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Army
name_original: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Army
description:
Road Hero Speed Car Racing Army is an arcade racing game. 

Drive your army car through superbly stunning roads, collect coins, avoid traffic cars and arrest the terrorists.

KEY FEATURES OF ROAD HERO SPEED CAR RACING ARMY ARE-

- Easy intuitive gameplay! - Interesting Story! - Lots of Coins to collect! - Avoid Collisions with traffic! - Arrest fast and furious Terrorists! - Race through exciting tracks! - Experience thrilling audio and visual effects!

Instructions to play: 

Left and Right to steer the vehicle.

P to Pause, Q to Un-Pause the game.
